enemies.name: Morning Scrum
enemies.description: What did you do yesterday?  What are you going to do today?
attacks: A coworker brings up an issue and starts a debate.
You aren't chosen to give your report.
'I know I'm breaking protocol but...'
enemies.death: At long last, Scrum breaks and you are free.

enemies.name: Email Inbox
enemies.description: A terrifying number of unread messages loom over your head
attacks: The meeting that was changed to a later date has been rescheduled for an even later date.
FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:FW:...
You are due for your annual security certification
Your password is about to expire.

enemies.name: Unruly Showerhead
enemies.description: It goes hot when you want cold and cold when you adjust it warmer.
attacks: Oooh, now it's hot!!!
Wait, that's too far, cold cold cold!
You're certain you did NOT shut the water off.
enemies.death: No soap in eyes?  Check.  Everything's clean?  Check.

enemies.name: A Stove
enemies.description: You cleaned it yesterday and it looks all sparkly.  If you're feeling brave, food can be cooked on it.
attacks: You watch your food heating up.  It's taking sooooo long.
A watched pot never boils.  You ponder how much time you'd save if you stopped watching.
Hey, watch out, you almost touched a hot burner!
You feel your time slipping slipping slipping into the future.  That Steve Miller song is now stuck in your head.

enemies.name: Waiting Around
enemies.description: The waiting is the hardest part...
attacks: You see clouds in the sky but it's not raining.  The parking lot sure is quiet.
A cop car drives by.  For no reason, you feel guilty.
For a moment, you thought you saw someone in one of the windows.
enemies.death: At long last, one of your coworkers takes pity on you and opens the door for you.

enemies.name: Print Shop Elves
enemies.description: These friendly and industrious folk are intensely creative.  Their amazing trinkets are prized and scattered around the office.
attacks: You are handed a 3d printed fidget tool.  It's oddly mesmerizing.
An elf shows you the latest upgrades to a scratch built robot.
The 3d printer begins moving.  You watch as it begins creating a new widget; only 6 hours and it'll be done.
For a few minutes of your time, you are rewarded with the intense desire to buy gears and servos to build your own devices.
enemies.death: Donning head sets, the elves are drawn back to their work, leaving you alone.

enemies.name: Project Work
enemies.description: There is a big chunk of work you should do before you can go to lunch.
attacks: This story is missing significant information that you need to figure out.
Someone stops by your cube to yack right when you get a good focus on the current problem.
This should just work!  It's not, but it really should work.
Your system locks up for a few seconds but then resumes operating as if nothing was wrong.
There's an off by one error somewhere in the code.  You can just feel it mocking you.
enemies.death: Well, there's no finishing your work and you've stared at your monitor a sufficient amount of time to justify a break.

enemies.name: Blind Mule Staff
enemies.description: A colorful collection of pleasant folk.  Their siren song entices you to hang out far longer than you should.
attacks: The tv above the bar is playing an episode of some 70's game show.  You are momentarily caught up in solving the current puzzle.
This food really is just what I wanted.  You think you may be getting full.
One of the ladies behind the bar says something funny and draws you into a long, involved, conversation.
You spend a long time staring at the beer selection, wishing you were free for the rest of the day.
You realize you should be going, but there's still food on your plate and it's nice just sitting where you are.
Asking for your ticket, the staff vanishes to take care of other customers.
enemies.death: At long last, you pay your ticket and flee before you've squandered the whole day in the Mule.

enemies.name: Foosball!!!
enemies.description:
It's a piecemeal foosball table.  Were it not for the ministrations of the Print Shop Elves, this contraption would have
 collapsed ages ago.
attacks: One of the players knocks the ball into the air, barely missing your head.
Poison Ball performs a physically impossible feat and reverses direction, right into your own goal.
Wobble Ball mocks you as it eludes your attempts to whack it.
You accidentally tap Money Ball and it rolls casually into your own goal.
enemies.death: With a sigh, the last point is made and the game ends.  Everyone steps back and realizes they need to get to a meeting.

enemies.name: Coffee Station
enemies.description: There are coffee makers and large thermoses for the general staff.
attacks: The sound of drip coffee lulls you into a fugue.
One of your coworkers stops by to see if there's any coffee already brewed.
No, it's not done yet.  You should really learn some patience.
enemies.death:
At long last, the brewing finishes.  You've done the office a great service.  As a reward, you snatch the last paper
 towel from a holder attached to the nearest refrigerator.
